timeline.bodyText: I'll investigate this TODO and probably addressed in a seperate PR.
timeline.author: CjHare

timeline.bodyText: This PR just moves around the ordering, but I'll raise a seperate PR to move the version into version.gradle for consistency.
timeline.author: CjHare
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,18 +5,21 @@ dependencies {
   implementation project(':ssz')
   implementation project(':util')
 
-  implementation 'org.apache.tuweni:tuweni-kv'
-  implementation 'org.apache.tuweni:tuweni-bytes'
-  implementation 'org.apache.tuweni:tuweni-ssz'
-  implementation 'com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind'
   compile 'com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-yaml'
+  compile group: 'org.mapdb', name: 'mapdb', version: '3.0.7'

replies.bodyText: That dependency is pull in by the util project dependency (util has that exposed an an api, meaning that is automatically added to the implementation path https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/java_library_plugin.html#sec:java_library_configurations_graph)
replies.author: CjHare
